title: Joshua Tree National Park: Park Newspaper Archive
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     Park Newspaper     Park Newspaper Archive                Park Newspaper Archive        The official park newspaper and trip planner, the Joshua Tree Guide, was redesigned in 2015. We now publish three issues per year: winter/spring (February-May), summer (June-September), and fall/winter (October-January). Past issues are archived here as PDFs for you to view or download.          Spring Guide: February 1 - May 31, 2016 Download the Spring 2016 Joshua Tree Guide (2.0 MB PDF). Feature articles in this issue are about the 2016 National Park Service Centennial, the diversity of wildflowers, and the history of women in the Joshua Tree area.          Fall Guide: Oct. 1, 2015 - Jan. 31, 2016 Download the Fall 2015 Joshua Tree Guide (1.9 MB PDF). Feature articles in this issue are about the night sky, historic preservation work in the park, and the importance of conserving water.          Summer Guide: June 1 - Sept. 30, 2015 Download the Summer 2015 Joshua Tree Guide (1.3 MB PDF). This issue includes must-read information on heat safety and safe summer travel in the desert.         Fall 2014 - Spring 2015 Joshua Tree Guide   Download the Fall 2014-Spring 2015 Joshua Tree Guide (6.4 MB PDF), in use from October 2014 through mid-May 2015.
